product.text:
Peter Pan and Captain Hook

Based on Disney’s animated film, this spirited narrative recounts the adventures of Peter Pan, as told by Wendy during a bedtime story for her two brothers. In an effort to locate the whereabouts of Peter Pan, the villainous Captain Hook kidnaps Tiger Lily, Princess of the Piccaninny Tribe, and fairy Tinker Bell. However, Hook’s plan is soon foiled when Peter Pan comes to the rescue yet again.

Tie-in Activity: Stage your own Peter Pan-style rescue by reenacting your child’s favorite scenes from the book. Spark his imagination by asking him to help create other scenarios in which Peter Pan could save Tinker Bell and Tiger Lily. For added fun, use props like stuffed animals, paper towel tube “swords,” wigs, or hats.
